fields.text: Welcome to Starcity, where comfortable community living thrives in San Francisco.
For information on availability or to schedule a community tour, press [INDEX].
To check current availability of our shared apartments and studios, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our leasing specialist for availability details.
To schedule a tour of a Starcity community home, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we transfer you to our tour coordination team.
For resident services and account support, press [INDEX].
For maintenance requests or repairs, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with our maintenance team.
For billing, payments, or account questions, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with our billing department.
